Protocols/ResourceDataProviderDelagte.ht.name: resourceDataProviderDidChangeState(from:to:)
Protocols/ResourceDataProviderDelagte.ht.abstract: Tells the delegate that state has changed

Protocols/ResourceDataProviderDelagte.ht.name: ResourceDataProviderDelagte
Protocols/ResourceDataProviderDelagte.ht.abstract: The ResourceDataProviderDelagte protocol defines methods which allow you to manage state changes of the resource data provider.

Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.name: success
Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.abstract: When loading a resource succeeds. Even if the result is empty, the state is .sucess and not .empty.

Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.name: error(_:)
Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.abstract: When an error occurs. The associated value represents the error

Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.name: loading(_:)
Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.abstract: When loading happens. The associated value is the loading task

Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.name: empty
Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.abstract: When the data provider has not yet loaded anything.

Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.name: hasSucceded
Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.abstract: When loading a resource succeeds. Even if the result is empty, the state is .sucess and not .empty.

Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.name: isEmpty
Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html#/s:.abstract: When the data provider has not yet loaded anything.

Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html.name: ResourceDataProviderState
Enums/ResourceDataProviderState.html.abstract: Represents the state of a resource data provider

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: delegate
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Function which gets called when state changes

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: content
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: The provided data which was fetched by the resource

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: state
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Describes the current state of the data provider. Listen for state changes by implementing ResourceDataProviderDelagte.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: observable
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: An observable where you can list on changes for the data provider.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: init(networkService:)
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Creates an instance with a given resource and exposes the result as a data provider.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: init(resource:networkService:)
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Creates an instance with a given resource and exposes the result as a data provider.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: init(resource:networkService:)
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Creates an instance which fetches a given resource and exposes the result as a data provider.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: clear()
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Clears all content and changes state to .empty

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: reconfigure(with:)
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Replaces the current resource with a new one.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: reconfigure(with:)
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Replaces the current resource with a new one.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.name: load(skipLoadingState:)
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html#/s:22D.abstract: Fetches the current resources via the network service.

Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html.name: ResourceDataProvider
Classes/ResourceDataProvider.html.abstract: ResourceDataProvider provides fetching resources and transforming them into a data provider. It provides its own state so you can react to it.
